column14: b"b'The Ranch at Arrington offers its residents an unprecedented level of accommodations. We are situated on 12 serene acres in south College Station and close to numerous shops, restaurants and many other conveniences. The Ranch at Arrington is a gated, luxury community offering all of the comforts and luxuries of a big city with the charm and character of a small town. Community comforts include a resort-style swimming pool, sundeck, outdoor fireplace, 24-hour fitness facility, and a billiards room with large screen TVs. Individual luxuries include black appliance packages, plank flooring, designer carpet, crown molding, and much more. Experience the latest wireless technology WireStar offers encompassing your internet, home automation & property gate access systems.. Are you ready to experience your next level of luxury living? Then come and live the world of difference that The Ranch lifestyle can provide.'"

column14: b"b'A location unlike any other. Feel the allure of local adventure, experience your best days, and embrace the satisfaction of life at Lake Walk at Traditions Apartments. As noteworthy for its quintessential Texan character as for its greater regional access, our apartment community offers brand new 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes featuring spacious 9 foot ceilings, wood plank style flooring, chef-inspired kitchens, and attached garages. Nestled in the master-planned Traditions Golf Community, in the heart of the Research Valley and BioCorridor, and next to Lake Walk Town Center \\xe2\\x80\\x93 the community is surrounded by world-class businesses, retail and restaurant destinations, and vibrant experiences and events.\\nThe expansive community spaces and state-of-the-art amenities include four resort-style, salt water swimming pools with poolside cabanas and hot tubs, outdoor kitchens and grills, putting green, and four state-of-the-art fitness centers, all surrounded by lush hill country landscaping.'"

At The Grove at Southwood, our amenities are designed to enhance your residential experience, inside and outside of your apartment home. Our two, two-bedroom den and three bedroom townhomes come with fully equipped, full-size kitchens, energy efficient appliances, granite countertops and ample cabinet storage.\\nOur convenient location off Southwest Parkway puts you in walking distance of the trails and attractions of Central Park and Wolf Pen Creek Parks, a 10 minute drive to Texas A&M University, as well as a global selection of good eats and fun, friendly watering holes and Post Oak Mall.'"

column14: b"b'Park West Student Living in College Station is located steps away from everything Texas A&M University has to offer. Our off-campus student housing community offers an unparalleled way of life that TAMU Aggies deserve. Located on the west side of the Texas A&M campus, Park West Student Housing is across the street from Kyle Field along George Bush Drive West allowing you to walk or bike to class! With FOUR Texas A&M Shuttle Bus stops, a Convenience Store, a Coffee Shop located on site, and a GROCERY STORE that is STEPS away, Park West has everything you want or need in your college apartment. Ready to get social? We\\xe2\\x80\\x99ve got you covered. Take advantage of our 50,000 sq.ft. rooftop lounge and deck. Larger than a football field, it boasts a HUGE pool with hot tub, private cabanas, and outdoor cooking space. You can also check out our two other resort style pools, grab some friends and host a BBQ in one of our grilling and fire pit areas, or head to one of our multiple gaming rooms or study lounges. Ready to get fit? Make sure to check out our 3 state-of-the-art fitness centers, sand volleyball courts, and jogging trail to blow off that extra steam. At Park West, you can always join our amazing staff and attend our planned Resident Programs to fill your social calendar, teach you about independent living and life skills, or tips on how to best succeed in college. Our Studio, 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom apartments are next level modern living with a student-detailed focus. Private bedrooms and locks, full size beds, walk-in closets, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer & dryers, free high-speed Wifi, and all-inclusive living packages with NO caps are included in all apartments at Park West in College Station. Whatever your budget, we have a place for you. With Aggie tradition and TAMU excellence in mind, Park West Student Living in College Station establishes this one-of-a-kind off campus community and we can\\xe2\\x80\\x99t wait for you to join us.'"

column14: b'b"Cherry Street offers you the finest in apartment living. Complete with efficient appliances, spacious cabinetry, and hardwood-style flooring, these homes have been designed to ensure a modern living experience. Just a short walk from Northgate Park and the Texas A&M campus, you can access the university\'s wide assortment of offerings in mere moments. Delicious restaurants are available in abundance. Open 24 hrs, Fuego Tortilla Grill is the perfect place to enjoy some quality Mexican food. When you are in the mood for some authentic Mediterranean cuisine, look no further than Zand\'s Persian Kebabs. If sushi is on your mind, head down to 40 Tempura Sushi. Widely viewed as one of the area\'s best Italian restaurants, Cenare Italian Restaurant offers authentic fare at an affordable price. When you prefer to eat in, the area is home to numerous grocery stores, including H-E-B, Walmart, and Kroger. Please call for an appointment today!"'

column14: b"b'The Lofts at Wolf Pen Creek is a luxurious apartment complex overlooking Wolf Pen Creek Park! We are located just minutes away from Texas A&M and HEB. Enjoy your college experience while maintaining a relaxed atmosphere. We have a Cross-fit approved two-story gym, study rooms, Starbucks coffee machine, a Spin Studio, Resort Style and Lap pools, BBQ pits, and so much more! Plus our on site security makes The Lofts a safe and relaxing stay for residents, parents, and friends alike! The Lofts offers 12 fully furnished floor plans so come in and experience all the great things The Lofts has to offer!'"

column14: b"b'Woodlands of College Station is just minutes from the Texas A&M University campus, so you can look forward to a very short walk to class in the mornings. That leaves you loads of time for a morning lie-in or a group fitness class at the ultra-modern, on-site 24-hour fitness center. When college is over for the day, come home to Woodlands of College Station and settle down in our 24-hour study lounge to get your research done and also print off your notes using one of the free printers. Later, meet friends for a game of pool in the clubhouse, or a face-off in either our basketball, tennis or volleyball court. You can also stay in for a TV night in our media center and movie center. With wood-style flooring and luxury amenities and some utilities included, your apartment at Woodlands of College Station is a luxurious home that will make your transition to college life an easy one. Call to schedule a tour with us today.'"

column14: b"b'You\\xe2\\x80\\x99ll love where you live and never run out of things to do at The Element at University Park \\xe2\\x80\\x93 come experience living in Bryan at its finest with resort-style amenities. Sharpen your golf game on our putting green or hit some tennis balls on our full-size tennis courts. If table tennis is more your style, we\\xe2\\x80\\x99ve got ping pong tables.
